lines.text: It's always 'fuck, shit, piss' all the time around here, I mean, if she could hear it, it would embarass her.
[looks at a picture of his girlfriend]
But Pig, this is a photograph.
It can't see, smell, hear, taste. Right? Mark... Now Mr. Santoro, if you please, adress a few obscene remarks to this totally inatimate photograph.
Jesus, would you look at the tits on that bitch!
My, would I dearly love to play a little 'hide the sausage' with that spectacular piece of wop-ass.
Hi baby. How'd you like a hot flesh injection with the old pork-sword, huh? Nine inches of steaming conga up that tight little...
Do you know what this is, boy?
Shut up! Open your mouth and stick out your tongue.
[Poteete sticks out his tongue and Gilbreath places the coin on it]
[Gilbreath grabs Poteete's throatt, forcing him to swallow the coin]
That's good boy, that's reeeal good. You're gonna be my little piggy-bank.
